sentences.en: A delicate wine will be overpowered by strong food.
sentences.cn: 一种精美的葡萄酒会被味道浓烈的食物压过。

sentences.en: But indicating that he and two other passengers had decided to try to overpower the hijackers.
sentences.cn: 还暗示他和另外两名乘客已经决定尝试制服劫机者.

sentences.en: By day the darkness fills him with dread; and anguish overpower him.
sentences.cn: 黑暗的日子使他恐怖, 困苦艰难跟随着他,好象准备厮杀的君王.

sentences.en: I figured the two of us could overpower him.
sentences.cn: 我估计咱们两人能对付得了他.

sentences.en: I overpower him the way he flattered.
sentences.cn: 我真受不了他那种溜须拍马的样子.

sentences.en: It took ten guardsmen to overpower him.

sentences.cn: 不要使你的船马力过大.

sentences.en: Police finally managed to overpower the gunman.
sentences.cn: 警察最终制伏了持枪歹徒。

sentences.en: Q: How do I get Overpower to show when it can be used?
sentences.cn: 问: 我如何让我的压制在可使用时弹出?

sentences.en: The conductor tended to overpower her with aggressive dynamics ( Thor Eckert, Jr ).
sentences.cn: 指挥打算用过分的力度变化压倒她 ( 小索尔·埃卡特 ).

sentences.en: There is now only one rank of the Overpower ability. Bonus damage removed.
sentences.cn: 现在只有1个等级的压制,压制的额外伤害加成被移除.

sentences.en: They give a soothing impression of calm and seldom overpower the main content of a page.
sentences.cn: 它会在页面中给人一种安详的沉着的印象,并且不会压倒页面的内容.

sentences.en: Vegetables such as peppers can overpower the flavor of the stock.
sentences.cn: 像甜椒这样的蔬菜会抢了原汤的味道。

sentences.en: We are also adding increased damage to Arms, possibly through Overpower or Slam.
sentences.cn: 我们也许通过压制和猛击来提高武器所造成的伤害.

sentences.en: You forever overpower him and he departs ; You change his appearance and send him away.
sentences.cn: 伯 14:20 你攻击人常常得胜、使他去世、你改变他的容貌、叫他往而不回.

sentences.en: You may put my body in prison, but my mind not even Zeus himself can overpower.
sentences.cn: 你可以把我的肉身关在监狱里, 但就是宙斯主神也制服不了我的心灵.

trans.tran_en: If something such as a colour or flavour overpowers another colour or flavour, it is so strong that it makes the second one less noticeable
